1100001011101100 0111011001001000 1 -> sum: 0011100100110101, cout: 1
0011001011000010 0001010011100111 1 -> sum: 0100011110101010, cout: 0
1111011100011100 1110011101111100 0 -> sum: 1101111010011000, cout: 1

1100010111101101 1011011100000010 1 -> sum: 0111110011110000, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
